episodes.name: Princess of Spices
episodes.overview: Maggie’s patience is put to the test when Rhiannon goes off the rails; Sonya sets about recruiting a school handyman; and Connor is bullied into a dodgy deal by Barry.

episodes.name: Grandmaster
episodes.overview: Dynasty’s world is turned upside down with the arrival of her criminal ex-boyfriend, Steve-O Malone, who wants a new start with her – trouble is, she has eyes for someone else; Maggie is forced to return to work after Lorraine lacks compassion; and while Audrey fights to keep her job, Tom makes a life-changing decision of his own.

episodes.name: Tan-Tastic
episodes.overview: Sonya has a day from hell which sees her dumped by Ndale and hospitalising Rhiannon; Lorraine and Nikki reach a crossroads in their relationship, Steve-O tightens his grip on Connor and Kevin; and an ex-pupil makes a surprise return to Waterloo Road.

episodes.name: Love Hurts
episodes.overview: Steve-O continues his reign of terror over Connor and Kevin, forcing Dynasty into a shock decision; Christine contemplates moving on from Waterloo Road; and Lula makes an unlikely ally in the shape of new science teacher, Esther Fairclough.

episodes.name: Revenge
episodes.overview: Desperate to rid themselves of Steve-O, Kevin and Connor enlist the help of Barry with a dramatic, but dangerous, plan; Sonya gets involved in love rival Audrey’s wedding – much to Ndale’s horror; and Michael clashes with Lorraine, forcing him to make a decision which will change Waterloo Road forever.

episodes.name: Sugar Mummy
episodes.overview: It is the day of Audrey and Ndale's wedding, but with jealous Sonya as bridesmaid the day may not go so smoothly. Elsewhere, Michael is keeping his plans to save Waterloo Road secret from Christine, Lula steps up her plans against Nox, and Nikki's first day as headteacher does not go to plan.

episodes.name: Journey’s End
episodes.overview: Michael returns to the school and makes one last ditch effort to stop Lorraine from making the school fee-paying. Lula’s campaign against Nox Pharmaceuticals reaches a shocking conclusion. The rift in the Barry family increases forcing Carol into taking some drastic action.

episodes.name: The Adrian Pile Show
episodes.overview: The Barrys family get ready to air their dirty laundry on national television. Kevin ends up under the spotlight though after an unexpected guest shows up. Christine decides to enjoy her new role as the school’s head teacher with gusto. Maggie needs to make a heart-breaking decision.

episodes.name: Hero
episodes.overview: Everybody is pleased to have Grantly back now that he is over his illness. Tom gets ready to donate his kidney to his life-long friend. After Kyle Stack shows up at the school though, the day ends in disaster as Tom attempts to help him.

8.name: Series 8
8.overview: Waterloo Road benefactor Lorraine wants a return on her investment but super head Michael insists that you can't make money from education. Will Lorraine listen, or is the school heading for disaster?

episodes.name: Beyond The Call Of Duty
episodes.overview: The school is still in mourning following Tom Clarkson's death as the new term starts. Audrey finds herself out of her depth after she suspects new pupils, Lenny and Lisa, are being neglected. New teacher, Sue Spark, feels the pressure on her first day. Simon has a secret he is keeping from the rest of his colleagues.

episodes.name: Sue Spark’s Bad Day
episodes.overview: The day from hell for new science teacher, Sue Spark, leads to a shady alliance with a student. George introduces the school to his new Mandarin teaching assistant, and wife, Princess Windsor, who is immediately popular with some of his class. Elsewhere, the pupils revolt against Christine’s cuts.

episodes.name: The Madness of King Windsor
episodes.overview: Princess is feeling increasingly irritated by George, which ends up leading to a temptation with one of his pupils. It is the battle of the sexes as Simon’s Apprentice competition takes over the school. Kevin suffers with itchy feet. Audrey believes that she’s made a new friend.

episodes.name: Text Rated
episodes.overview: It is the launch party for Waterloo Junk-tion and Rhiannon’s determined to bag herself a date. George attempts to sort things out with Princess but learns that it might be too late. Audrey finally works out that her new friend Moira isn't what she seems to be.

episodes.name: Crossing The Line
episodes.overview: Audrey has worked out the twin’s plan to try and scam her out of money, and calls in their estranged grandfather for support. George is upset about Princess’s exit and Christine finally realises that he can’t teach Mandarin without her. Connor finds some hidden talents in the Home Economics class.

episodes.name: Grantly’s Perfect Poetry
episodes.overview: Grantly returns to teaching at the school and soon finds the place as chaotic as ever. Kacey prepares for her first boxing match. Barry sees it as an opportunity to make some money. Sue starts to take tranquilisers to help get her through the day.

episodes.name: Lies Mothers Tell
episodes.overview: The pupils and staff attempt to come to terms with the loss of Grantly. Nikki has a really difficult decision to make after her estranged daughter shows up at the school. Kacey is excited about going to America and decides to try and take matters into her own hands after Carol refuses to let her go.

episodes.name: Don’t Mention The War
episodes.overview: It’s Living History Week at Waterloo Road and the whole school is in high spirits but it’s not long before the day takes a turn for the worse when three pupils take seriously ill.  Simon and Sue up the ante in their campaign against Christine and Kevin woos Dynasty back into his arms.

episodes.name: Father Figure
episodes.overview: A visit from boxing champion Nicola Adams restores Kacey’s confidence in her own abilities. Lenny makes a friend in the new supply teacher, but panic soon ensues when it’s discovered the teacher is not what he seems.

episodes.name: Happy Ever After
episodes.overview: As Christine and Simon go up for the headship they clash over how to deal with a bullied pupil. Meanwhile, Kacey's boxing fund is stolen, jeopardising her training trip to America.c

episodes.name: Bad Girl
episodes.overview: A beautiful new girl enrols in the school but doesn’t waste any time in causing mayhem amongst both staff and pupils with her outrageous behaviour. Simon launches his new Resilience Education plan to make the pupils tougher and Nikki returns from the holidays with a new love interest.

episodes.name: Sugar Daddy
episodes.overview: Carol Barry’s money making ventures lead her down some unexpected paths.  Connor is offered his dream job but has to convince his mum to let him go.  Nikki and Vix take another big step in their relationship.

episodes.name: Girls Just Wanna Have Fun
episodes.overview: Gabriella continues to end up having more enemies than friends. Christine finds it hard to deal with her emotions as Connor leaves for London . Nikki is concerned about Eve’s reaction to news of her engagement.

episodes.name: Suspicious Minds
episodes.overview: Lenny gets carried away with the Resilience Programme and causes widespread panic when he accuses the local shop of shady dealings.  George and Carol’s flush of new love is marred by the arrival of his very opinionated mother. A vindictive Barry Barry visits Waterloo Road.

episodes.name: Out Of Bounds
episodes.overview: It’s time for the long-awaited Resilience Camp but it seems that some of the students and the staff have ulterior motives for going on the trip.  Gabriella ups the ante in her obsessive pursuit of Hector and Christine is forced to confront her feelings about George.

episodes.name: A Bolt From The Blue
episodes.overview: Chalky makes a return to Waterloo Road to lend support to Kevin ahead of his bursary interview, but events take a dire turn when Kevin is suddenly taken ill.  Nikki tries in vain to hide her betrayal from Vix and Audrey vows to support Lula when she’s threatened with deportation.

episodes.name: No Where to Run
episodes.overview: George is left in charge while Christine has a day off but is soon out of his depth when Audrey rouses the school in a mass protest against Lula’s deportation.  Barry wants to discuss his future with Gabriella and Dynasty is distressed at Kevin’s condition.

episodes.name: Dynasty’s Choice
episodes.overview: Dynasty is faced with a terrible dilemma when she discovers how Barry is making money.  Christine is angry to find Darren with inappropriate images again but discovers some shocking truths when she visits his home.

episodes.name: End of The Road
episodes.overview: Christine makes a series of extremely bad decisions leaving her job and her future hanging in the balance.  Kacey Barry makes a welcome return to the school but Gabriella is furious to find herself pushed out of the limelight.

episodes.name: New Highs, New Lows
episodes.overview: A sober Christine deals with the repercussions of her drink driving offence.  Kacey is selected for the Commonwealth Games but Gabriella soon puts an end to her happiness.  Nikki’s future at Waterloo Road is suddenly thrown into uncertainty.

9.name: Series 9
9.overview: Christine settles in as head of Waterloo Road but quickly finds new deputy Simon is after her job. As well as unruly students and her drink problem, old friend George is not all he seems.

episodes.name: Home Sweet Home
episodes.overview: It's a fresh new term and dynamic headteacher Vaughan Fitzgerald and his family arrive at Waterloo Road and attempt to fit into their new lives. Darren's world falls apart after a shocking incident at home and George learns never to cross a member of the Barry family.

episodes.name: One Good Turn
episodes.overview: Vaughan is anxious about the launch of Waterloo Road's big community initiative.

episodes.name: Baby Boom
episodes.overview: Darren can't understand why Rhiannon is taking the virtual-baby project so seriously.

episodes.name: Pool Party
episodes.overview: Gabriella returns to school to find some students determined to make her life difficult.

episodes.name: Testing Times
episodes.overview: Will the pressure of mock exams prove to be too much for Lenny?

episodes.name: Like Father Like Son
episodes.overview: Simon and Sue's dinner party goes badly wrong after Hector speaks out of turn.

episodes.name: A Tangled Web
episodes.overview: The police descend on Waterloo Road as the hack on Wiredata Systems is traced to it.

episodes.name: Ties That Bind
episodes.overview: Allie convinces Vaughan to send Justin to a boarding school.

episodes.name: Yesterday’s Child
episodes.overview: Sue finds herself in hot water when Hector threatens to tell Simon about their affair.

episodes.name: The Final Straw
episodes.overview: Vaughan goes to the police after Justin punches Allie, and Darren arranges a surprise.

episodes.name: A New Start
episodes.overview: It's a new term and the council wants to merge Waterloo Road with Havelock High.

episodes.name: Scott’s Bike Ride
episodes.overview: Vaughan hopes the new bike bank scheme will show the school off to the community.

episodes.name: Lenny’s Dilemma
episodes.overview: Vaughan's newly-qualified teachers Marco and Guy start work, but it's not long before Guy recognises Carrie Norton and the school comes down heavily on their relationship. Christine's plan to keep Audrey's smothering at bay backfires on her, while Sonya is forced to reveal a very private secret.

episodes.name: Scott, Bonnie and Justin Hit the Beach
episodes.overview: A trip to the coast does not go to plan after Kenzie lets slip about Bonnie two-timing Scott and Justin. More secrets are then revealed and one of the group runs off putting themself in serious danger.

episodes.name: A Shock for Havelock
episodes.overview: Waterloo Road struggles to live up to rival Havelock High when the PTA comes to visit.  Leo’s attachment to his computer game raises serious concern over his state of mind and Sonya frets over her impending test results.

episodes.name: Kenzie Leaves Home
episodes.overview: Dale’s dreams of pro-cycling are thrown into disarray as the pressure of mock exams take over.  Abdul is shocked by the revelation of a deep family secret and Kenzie’s relationship with her mother falls apart.

episodes.name: Sonya's Date Night
episodes.overview: Dale struggles to come to terms with his failure to make the cycling team.

episodes.name: Lenny Loses It
episodes.overview: Dale's erratic behaviour reaches new heights and it's up to Lenny and Maggie to pick up the pieces. Abdul meets his mum, but it's not as he expected. The school gets a heads-up about a surprise inspection, but will the preparation be enough to save it?

episodes.name: Justin Confronts Leo
episodes.overview: Vaughan is torn between campaigning to stop the merger and Justin's exclusion. Things take an unexpected turn when Kenzie gets involved, while Lorna reveals a buried secret when someone from her past turns up. Sonya discovers something about Guy that sets her own lie onto a different course.

episodes.name: Final Episode
episodes.overview:
Waterloo Road pulls every last punch in a desperate bid to halt the merger with Havelock High. Despite the absence of Vaughan, the students rally to uncover the council’s real plans and Lorna’s ex-husband shows his true colours.  The day of the consultation has arrived and it’s Waterloo Road’s last chance to halt the merger with Havelock High.  The council and its supporters are out in force to convince the community and parents that the merger is the best outcome for everyone.

With no headmaster steering the ship, the students take matters into their own hands and they soon discover that the council is not being transparent about its real plans. Can the pupils save the school or is it really the end of Waterloo Road?

Marco grows suspicious of Lorna’s ex-husband but his meddling leads to a dangerous situation for him and Kenzie. Who will come to the rescue and who will finally win Kenzie’s heart – Scott or Justin?

10.name: Series 10
10.overview: New head Vaughan Fitzgerald arrives with his partner Allie and her two children. When his two teenage sons from a previous marriage arrive unexpectedly to live with them, it all gets very complicated.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: It’s a new term for William Beswick High, but with pupils rioting, head Kim Campbell is forced into drastic changes. A fugitive found hiding in the school gives everyone a shock.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Waterloo Road is rocked by shocking news, while Danny lands himself in trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The Walters family deal with an unexpected crisis, pushing a stressed Preston to the brink, while Tonya and Izzy skip school.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: It’s Amy’s big day, but a surprise visitor from her past and Kelly Jo’s tumultuous behaviour threaten to ruin everything.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: As Neil bonds with refugee Norullah, the year nines are busy digging up the truth about his personal life. An inquest triggers an emotional breakdown and confession from Coral.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Samia’s day is derailed by the discovery of a group chat started by the male students. Meanwhile, Donte’s angry outburst has repercussions across the school.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The past catches up with Danny at the end of term show. Meanwhile, Kim is left feeling hurt and betrayed by an unexpected person.

11.name: Series 11
11.overview: Riots, scandals, fractured families and familiar faces - Waterloo Road is back with a new term and a whole new attitude. Who said education was easy?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Dwayne clashes with a new pupil, whose arrival causes fireworks. As Dwayne continues to rebel, Joe and Mike question their future. Meanwhile, Kim’s rocked by a blast from the past.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A revelation from Kelly Jo causes huge ructions between Nicky and Debs. Meanwhile, an increasingly infatuated Amy pursues a new crush.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Preston and Kai give the school something to talk about. Meanwhile, the poetry slam gets off to a rocky start, and Donte is left red-faced.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Shola’s behaviour causes a panic, and Val suspects that she’s hiding something from them. Meanwhile, Kelly Jo’s first day out of the BU doesn’t get off to the best start.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Kim rallies the troops when a last-minute Ofsted inspection is sprung on the team. Elsewhere, a knife crime initiative gets underway.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Desperate times force Nicky to consider the unthinkable. Meanwhile, Preston and Myles challenge each other – with devastating consequences.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: It’s the debut of Radio Waterloo Road, and as Danny uses the launch to rehabilitate himself, Myles has other ideas in mind – with explosive ramifications for the entire school.

12.name: Series 12
12.overview: Affairs, scandals, blackmail and many, many headteachers. Who said education was easy?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Kim rolls out a fresh initiative that causes fireworks for staff and pupils alike, and two worlds collide when Tonya forms an unlikely bond with new boy Schuey.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Preston has a disastrous first day back at school, and Amy’s mentoring scheme gets off to a rocky start. As Amy battles to keep the peace, no-one can escape Preston’s line of fire.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Shola’s new obsession sends shockwaves through the school, with devastating consequences for Joe and Mike.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: It’s a big day for Kelly Jo as she presents her work to the whole school as well as trying to work out who she is and where she is going. Libby proves to be a thorn in her side.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Amy comes head-to-head with Schuey, but her actions cause uproar. Meanwhile, Kelly Jo has some earth-shattering news for Dean.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Kelly Jo makes a momentous decision, and whilst most of the teachers are away on an inset day, Libby leads the pack as the teens run riot in school.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Tonya is forced to take drastic action after a scandalous discovery, and Preston takes the law into his own hands.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Donte is rocked by the arrival of a ghost from his past that threatens life as he knows it. Meanwhile, Kim and Nicky are faced with a tricky situation.

13.name: Series 13
13.overview: With a swathe of long-term refusers descending on Waterloo Road, the balance of peace and harmony rests on thin ice.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: While attempting to support Amy, Joe leads the school into a disaster as the teachers turn on him. Libby face harassment and finds a hero in an unexpected place.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: New head, Steve Savage, hits the ground running with a big crackdown on vapes. His son, Billy, has the misfortune of being Schuey’s next target.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Donte steps up for a struggling Tonya, while Nicky’s distracted by an old flame. Coral and Neil’s relationship is put to the test when she’s asked to reprimand him.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: While setting up Battle of the Bands, pressure mounts on Val when she highlights the lack of support for teachers. Meanwhile, Tonya struggles to be believed as she has a crisis.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Billy finally fights back, but disaster strikes when things go too far, and new deaf pupil Luca acts out when he struggles to fit in at Waterloo Road.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Steve and Billy sweat as suspicions rise and attention turns to a missing pupil. Meanwhile, Kelly Jo finds her voice to fight for what’s right.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Preston and Nicky panic as they get caught in the firing line, and Schuey makes a desperate call when Steve goes too far.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Steve and Billy fight to keep their secrets as Kim returns to restore order. And Nicky and Donte’s relationship is put to the test.

14.name: Series 14
14.overview: Waterloo Road sees a changing of the guard with new head Steve Savage.
